title: The oral tradition in a visual age
author: VD
content_html: Star Wars: Retold (by someone who hasn’t seen it).Frankly, I’m shocked that such a gay-friendly movie was marketed to impressionable young children in the late 70’s. Courtesy of Dr. Read, who, as is his wont, sees it in the context of an ambient supersaturation spectrum. Which, to me, really sounds as if it should be the name of a complete digital collection of The Orb.
content_text:
Star Wars: Retold (by someone who hasn’t seen it)
.Frankly, I’m shocked that such a gay-friendly movie was marketed to impressionable young children in the late 70’s.  Courtesy of Dr. Read, who, as is his wont, sees it
in the context of an ambient supersaturation spectrum
.  Which, to me, really sounds as if it should be the name of a complete digital collection of The Orb.
